body: wish we got more nami and robin fucking their crew and less of the random no name idiots. luffy fucking nami and robin both at once would be nice to see. why are all the super hot really well know girls in good anime always in prostitution doujin and not just having fun fucking their friends. its an overused theme and its kind of boring now. no one makes that many doujin that are just people fucking for fun. instead its rape prostitution ntr and all the dumb stuff. no one has anymore basic thoughts anymore and its dumb. and its most of the great artists too that end up doing the running themes. that or stick to 1 character over all the others. like sakura from naruto almost always being naruto's cum dump. we almost never get any ino. and in fairy tail its always lucy or erza and they are always in prostitution doujin instead of just fucking their friends for fun. im tired of all the rape themes and prostitution themes that are overused.
i hope there's a lot more of this '' woman pirate in paradise'' hahahahaha

english translate ASAP please :)
it's been a while since you guys make another One Piece hentai .... :(
last one was too short now this one has one page of robin. what a con.
He did apoligise at the end tho
robin on cover but no robin in the actual pages :(
